original_title: Doce muertes violentas de artistas contemporáneos Vol. Uno
overview: The filmmaker interviewed a selection of victims (Teresa Margolles, Ximena Cuevas, Miguel Calderón, Tayana Pimentel and Kurt Hollander) about the way in which they would want to die or be murdered. Each victim then performed his/her own death on video.
title: Twelve Violent Deaths of Contemporary Artists: Vol. One
